subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hanford, known as Babe, was an 18-year-old apprentice jockey when he won the 1936 Kentucky Derby in his only appearance in the race.
snippet: Mr. Hanford, known as Babe, was an 18-year-old apprentice jockey when he won the 1936 Kentucky Derby in his only appearance in the race.
